trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the value and location of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> cell for use when copying content to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Incapsula il valore e il percorso di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> cella per utilizzarla quando si copia il contenuto negli Appunti.

trans-unit.source: This structure is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Questa struttura viene utilizzata il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento di dati per la riga contenente la cella da copiare.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: La colonna contenente la cella da copiare.

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di testo della cella da copiare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la colonna contenente la cella da copiare.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: La colonna contenente la cella da copiare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore di testo della cella da copiare.

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di testo della cella da copiare.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current and specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto corrente e specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> istanze sono equivalenti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> istanza da confrontare con l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current and specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instances have the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item*>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content*> property values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto corrente e specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> istanze hanno lo stesso <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content*>i valori delle proprietà; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Il codice hash è basato sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A>i valori delle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il codice hash per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento dati per la riga contenente la cella da copiare.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento di dati per la riga contenente la cella da copiare.

trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> istanze sono equivalenti.
